com.brightcove.player.media

Class Catalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.media.Catalog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    @Emits(events={"findPlaylist","findVideo"})
@ListensFor(events="error")
public class Catalog
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component
    The Catalog class provides asynchronous methods for retrieving information about videos and playlists from Brightcove's Media API services. Network requests such as those implemented by the Catalog class sometimes fail. If the request succeeds, the listener's onVideo/onPlaylist method will be invoked. If an error occurs during the execution of the request, the listener's onError method will be invoked.

    • Method Detail

      • findVideoByID

        public void findVideoByID(java.lang.String videoID,
                 VideoListener videoListener)
        Retrieves a Video from the Media API service by its video ID.
        Parameters:
        videoID - string containing the ID of the video to find.
        videoListener - A callback which will be invoked when the request finishes or an error occurs.

      • findVideoByID

        public void findVideoByID(java.lang.String videoID,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options,
                 VideoListener videoListener)
        Retrieves a Video from the Media API service by its video ID.
        Parameters:
        videoID - string containing the ID of the video to find.
        options - An optional Map of query parameter additions or overrides for the Media API request.
        videoListener - A callback which will be invoked when the request finishes or an error occurs.

      • findVideoByReferenceID

        Parameters:
        referenceID - string containing the reference ID of the video to find.
        videoListener - A callback which will be invoked when the request finishes or an error occurs.
